profile:
Best Painters in the Fraser Valley!
 
Benchmark Painting is a family run business providing residential and commercial service to the entire Lower Mainland. Our team of professionals offer quality interior and exterior solutions for any project, large or small.  Benchmark Painting has earned and maintained an exceptional reputation by delivering exactly what our customers expect in a professional painting.
service_area:
Serving Fraser Valley, Abbotsford, Langley, Surrey, White Rock, Delta,
Port Moody, Port Coquitlam, Coquitlam, Pitt Meadows, Maple Ridge, Ridge Meadows, New Westminister, Burnaby.
products:
Voted Best Painting Company 2010 by the consumers of Homestars.com!

Rooms starting at $99 each including all paint and labour. 3 room minimum required.  Call today for details.  
 
Call today for this promotion!
services:
Residential & Commercial Specialists
Benchmark Painting is committed to providing top quality workmanship as well as superior customer service. Benchmark's team of professionals offer quality interior and exterior solutions for any home or Business, both large and small. We offer free estimates and a limited one year warranty. 

Ceiling Re-Texturing
Has water or a renovation damaged your ceiling?
Benchmark painting is an industry leader in ceiling repair and re-texturing.

Surface Preparation
We never cut corners on surface preparation. We will sand, caulk, fill and prime all surfaces as needed. Thorough preparation is essential to quality painting. we will always apply two coats of paint. Your work will be done exactly as contracted and as scheduled. You can expect this and more from Benchmark Painting. 

Moulding Installations
Benchmark Painting Provides all your moulding needs with the attention to detail and quality our clients have come to expect from us.

profile:
Hello! 

Home Trends Painting was started in 2018 but I have more then 10 years experience in the industry. 
We do interior and exterior residential and commercial painting. 
We do all kinds of painting, including the epoxy on garage floors. 
We work all over the lower mainland,mainly in Surrey, Vancouver, Burnaby, New Westminster, Richmond, Abbotsford, Langley and even work on Vancouver Island as well, depending on the projects.

Give us a call today at (778) 387-3007. We look forward to hearing from you!

profile:
Welcome to Buhler Painting Ltd!
Buhler Painting is committed to managing our projects with integrity and attention to detail. We have experience in painting homes, new residential projects, commercial properties and businesses with excellence!

Buhler Painting Ltd is a full-service painting company located in Abbotsford, British Columbia servicing Vancouver and the entire Fraser Valley.  When the company was founded in 2006, we quickly realized that by taking care of our clients, offering fair prices, and delivering what we promised on time, people wanted to do business with us. This foundation of Buhler Painting has allowed us to work with hundreds of clients over the years.

Thanks to our remarkable clients who have referred us to others, we have grown to be a reputable and reliable painting company known for our fair prices, quality work, and reliable staff-a reputation known throughout the Lower Mainland.

We finish with distinction - Quality workmanship you can trust

If you have any questions, or would like to book a quote, please do not hesitate in contacting our Project Coordinator, Karen Denevers at 604-855-1042.

We appreciate your time in viewing our galleries and considering Buhler Painting for your next residential or commercial project.
specialities:
1- Very Fair Prices: We guarantee a competitive price and a detailed estimate leaving you confident that our work will fit within your budget and bring your vision to reality.

2- Quality Work: Our top of the line equipment and well trained staff provide professional service and quality work you can trust.

3- Reliability: We work hard to complete your project with a quality finish, meet your timeline and save you money.
name: Buhler Painting Ltd.
